sections.paragraph: + A priest in the time of King David eleventh in the order of the "governors" of the sanctuary. (1 Chronicles 24:12) + One of the latest descendants of the royal family of Judah. (1 Chronicles 3:24) + High priest at Jerusalem at the time of the rebuilding of the walls under Nehemiah. (Nehemiah 3:1,20,21) (B.C. 446.) + A singer in the time of Ezra who had married a foreign wife. (Ezra 10:24) + A son of Zattu, (Ezra 10:27) and + A son of Bani, (Ezra 10:36) both of whom had transgressed in the same manner. (B.C. 458.)
